Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Capital City in 1960...
Injured on 7/24/1961 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/10/1962...
Had first career hit on 4/25/1962, off Russell Burleson (GHG)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1963, going 2-0, 0.43...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1964, going 2-1, 0.56...
Was selected to the 1965 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1967, winning 2 games with a 0.55 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1968, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1969, winning 2 games with a 1.20 ERA...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1970, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Hit first career homerun on 10/4/1970, off Brian Villalobos (WT)...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1971, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1971, going 5-0, 0.61...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/1971, winning one game with a 2.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1972, going 4-1, 1.06...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1973, going 6-0, 1.79...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1974, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1974, going 6-0, 1.61...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1974, going 23-9, 1.75 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1975, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1975, going 4-1, 1.04...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1975, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1975, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1976, going 4-1, 1.28...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/9/1977 to a 4-year deal worth $10,911,300 per year...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1977, going 5-0, 1.29...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1977, going 6-0, 0.69...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1978, going 6-0, 0.71...

Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Outstanding Pitcher Award in 1979, going 19-6, 1.87 ERA...
